Title: Relates to exempting tension pneumothorax decompression needles from criminal possession of a hypodermic instrument
Summary: Relates to exempting possession of tension pneumothorax decompression needles by paramedics and EMTs from criminal possession of a hypodermic instrument.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to exempting tension pneumothorax decompression needles from criminal possession of a hypodermic instrument
